title: Cab
lyrics:
New York snow this time of year
There's nothing more beautiful to me
Except for you
Makin' my way uptown and down
Seein' familiar places, faces

In my pile of coffee grounds



The days are better the nights are still so lonely

Sometimes I think I'm the only cab on the road

Sometimes I think I'm the only cab on the road



Watchin' my breath rise in the sun

Pullin' myself in to make warm

Helplessly feel for my phone and drive away



This new rhythm I pursue

Is just my gettin' over you 

Tellin' myself that I need to



The days are better the nights are still so lonely

Sometimes I think I'm the only cab on the road

Sometimes I think I'm the only cab on the road



I'm still lookin' for -

Don't wanna say I -

To be alone



The days are better the nights are still so lonely

Sometimes I think I'm the only cab on the road

The days are better the nights are still so lonely

Sometimes I think I'm the only cab on the road

Sometimes I think I'm the only cab on the road
